33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas narrated that the Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) said:"The Hour will not be established until 'Allah, Allah is not said on the earth

chapter.eng-name: Something Else: There Shall Not Come A Time Except That The One After It Is More Evil Than It
